detail_desc: 5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist and slim legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Suede court shoes with covered heels. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles at the top and a magnetic press-stud fastener. Unlined. The matching clutch bag is attached to one handle, has a zip at the top and is lined. Size of handbag 15x32x46.5 cm. Size of clutch 22x32 cm.
Flat cap in a woven wool blend. Lined.
Skirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, seam at the hips and wide flounce at the hem.

Fitted outdoor shorts in stretch, fast-drying functional fabric with a zip fly, press-stud at the waist, and hook and loop safety fastener at the waistband. Zipped front pockets, a zipped leg pocket and a stretch panel at the crotch for optimum mobility and comfort.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hair scarf in an airy weave with an embroidered pattern. Can be tied around the head or neck.
Turban in a soft knit containing some wool.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Blouse in a softly draping weave with a round neck and small opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, long batwing sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses with matt plastic frames and tinted, mirrored, UV-protective lenses in a shimmering metallic contrasting colour.
Pleated trousers in jersey with a slight sheen. High elasticated waist and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Gently tailored jacket in sturdy satin made from a cotton blend with a sheen. Notch lapels, a concealed button at the front, flap welt pockets, a short slit at the cuffs and a high back vent. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved, patterned sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Regular fit. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts. Jersey T-shirt with press-studs on one shoulder and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with buttons at the shoulders, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
Patterned beach hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 6 cm.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder body in soft, ribbed jersey with decorative buttons at the top, short raglan sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Flip-flops in imitation leather with square toes and heels. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Push-up bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Bow tie/tie with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, and French front. Welt chest pocket with a button and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Relaxed fit - a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Ballet pumps in patterned canvas with a glittery, appliquéd elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjamas in patterned organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a frill trim at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Double-layered hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jeggings in superstretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and back pockets. The cotton content of the jeggings is partly recycled. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Padded, sleeveless fancy dress costume in jersey.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.
Sock-style court shoes in imitation leather with a jersey top section and pointed toes. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Wide jersey top in a cotton and modal blend with short sleeves and a chest pocket.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar and short sleeves.
Short, sleeveless nightdress in soft jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Make-up bag in transparent plastic with a print motif. Zip with a tab at the top. Size 15x21 cm.
Tights with extra space for a growing tummy. 40 denier.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and a wrapover hood. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and short slits in the sides.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gently rounded hem.
Top in soft jersey with an interactive motif. Narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a contrasting colour press-stud placket and ribbing.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Non-wired lace bra with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Bell-shaped skirt in a soft, fine knit with concealed elastication at the waist and terry appliqués in a contrasting colour.
Wide blouse in woven fabric with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long, wide raglan sleeves with smocking and buttons at the cuffs.

Boots in imitation leather with an appliqué on the tongue, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam in a contrasting colour around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Embroidered patches that can be ironed onto garments. Sizes from 5x5 cm to 8x8 cm.
Short, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with a high waist with covered elastication. Rounded hem that is shorter at the sides. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with short, elasticated balloon sleeves in woven fabric with pleats on the shoulders.
Shorts in patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jacket in soft, patterned thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves and trims around the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Skirt in tulle with glitter. Elastic waistband with a bow, seam with a small frill trim and a flounced tier to the hem. Lined.
Boxy jumper in a soft, glittery knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dress in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with a gathered, stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey. High waist with pleats, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, and tapered legs.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. T-shirt top in jersey with a round neck. Piqué shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Flat cap in a cotton weave with elastication at the back. Lining and sweatband in cotton.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted jersey cropped top in a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with vertical seams at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and an open back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
